divs: sighting detailsi'm up in the northwest valley of phoenix so i never actually saw the ufo that was reported. but about 10-15 minutes before the reported event i watched 3 fighters about 30 seconds apart in the sky over luke air force base. they were all headed south in the casa grande \ tuscon direction. it didn't appear to be a drill, all 3 had their afterburners firing (you could distinctly hear all 3 as they took off) until i lost sight of them. so they appeared to be headed somewhere in a hurry. given the direction they were headed and the number of jets described in the report i'm almost positive these are the 3 fighter planes that were seen chasing down the object in san manuel.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around November 5th 2010
Summary: Confirmation of San Manuel, AZ report
